ValidationRule.description: Ensures that user can only progress to next stage i.e. Received or Declined
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Gift_In_Kind', ISCHANGED(Stage__c), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE(Stage__c) ,'Accepted'), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Stage__c,'Received')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Stage__c,'Declined')) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You can only progress to Received or Declined stage.
